sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> and <radical>Wolverine</radical> take a <radical>slide</radical> to <kanji>Italy</kanji>. Wolverine’s leader is Professor X, and they are both sliding down a big slide to Italy. How fun!
meaningInfo: Imagine Wolverine and his leader Professor X going down this slide to Italy. Hear them wooping and cheering as they ride down the slide. Whee~
readingMnemonic: Before Professor X can get off the slide into <kanji>Italy</kanji>, a large <reading>ea</reading>gle (<ja>い</ja>) swoops down and plucks him right out of his wheelchair. That eagle is very strong. Goodbye, Professor X!
readingInfo: Imagine this eagle carrying Professor X away from Italy and out over the ocean. You can also remember this reading easily because Italy starts with the letter I. Super simple stuff.
